channel.title: Rank '7' Crown
channel.description:
Hey everyone, I'm having issues with my 'Owner' Crown appearing next to my name in the chatbox.
I've been able to get the first 6 rank crowns to appear correctly next to my name although, When I set my rights to 7 and try to chat. The first line does not show anything. Then I chat again and my client crashes. [CODE] Exception in thread "Thread-5" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at client.drawChatArea(client.java:255) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8303) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9259) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:176) at client.run(client.java:4825) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/CODE]
client.drawChatArea(client.java:255) Line: [CODE]modIcons[6].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12);[/CODE]
Media: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/wl3xw8.gif[/img]
Any help is appreciated, Thanks!

item.title: Rank '7' Crown
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

sk8rdude461:

When you were adding in the new chat icons, you added something in incorrectly and it added that line when you send messages. Hard to explain, but you’re going to want to edit your public chat method…

Yep, You are correct. I’m going to look into it.

Read full topic

item.title: Rank '7' Crown
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

When you were adding in the new chat icons, you added something in incorrectly and it added that line when you send messages. Hard to explain, but you’re going to want to edit your public chat method…

Read full topic

item.title: Rank '7' Crown
item.dc:creator: @iBucky iBucky
item.description:
@iBucky wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:2, topic:531552”]You need to change the int used for the sprite unpacking…
the int: modIcons[6].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12);
Is higher than the amount you’re unpacking, or how much you have declared.
Look at this:
for(int i = 0; i <= 6; i++){
modIcons[i ] = new Sprite(“Player/MODICONS “+i+””);
}
Note: the red digit may be different, or your modIcons may be named different…

And this too:
modIcons = new Sprite[7];
chatImages = new Sprite[7];

Again, the numbers may be different, but your issue is because the number (6) is higher than how many you’re unpacking, or declared…[/quote]

Thanks mate, I found it at: for (int l4 = 0; l4 < 7; l4++) modIcons[l4] = new Sprite(streamLoader_2, "mod_icons", l4);

Now, I’m trying to figure out why there is a blank in the chat box. When the chatbox is totally empty and I type something, It will not appear until I type something a second time to bump the first line up.

Any Ideas?

Read full topic

item.title: Rank '7' Crown
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

You need to change the int used for the sprite unpacking…
the int: modIcons[6].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12);
Is higher than the amount you’re unpacking, or how much you have declared.
Look at this:
for(int i = 0; i <= 6; i++){
modIcons[i ] = new Sprite(“Player/MODICONS “+i+””);
}
Note: the red digit may be different, or your modIcons may be named different…

And this too:
modIcons = new Sprite[7];
chatImages = new Sprite[7];

Again, the numbers may be different, but your issue is because the number (6) is higher than how many you’re unpacking, or declared…

Read full topic

Hey everyone, I’m having issues with my ‘Owner’ Crown appearing next to my name in the chatbox.

I’ve been able to get the first 6 rank crowns to appear correctly next to my name although, When I set my rights to 7 and try to chat.
The first line does not show anything. Then I chat again and my client crashes.
